Please join us for the next Sensitive Data Interest Group meeting onÂ February 7thÂ at 9:30AM ESTÂ 

https://harvard.zoom.us/j/8097317367Â and see attached .ics outlook calendar invite

Many institutions and Dataverse installations are considering models for sensitive data deposit and sharing, including remote storage links, enhanced storage and security, institutional checklists and policies, and more.Â 

Join us for a conversation and share your ideas about support for sensitive data in Dataverse! IG meetings in the past have addressed the complexities of managing sensitive data in academic repositories, with a focus on integrations of technology and policy.Â Â Â 

Hope to see you there,
-Amber Leahey, Cheryl Thompson, Sebastian Karcher, Sonia Barbosa, Ceilyn Boyd
invite (4).ics
Nice. Would you like to add it to the Dataverse Community Calendar (on Google Calendar) as well? I'm happy to give you access.
